subject: Football
College Athletics
Hospitals
lead_paragraph: Iowa Coach Kirk Ferentz said 5 of the 13 players who were ill this week with a muscle disorder after grueling off-season workouts were being discharged from the hospital.
snippet: Iowa Coach Kirk Ferentz said 5 of the 13 players who were ill this week with a muscle disorder after grueling off-season workouts were being discharged from the hospital.
